features: [ EXFOLIATING FACE WASH ] Salicylic acid (SA) is a beta hydroxy acid (BHA), an effective exfoliator that removes dead skin cells and promotes radiance. Salicylic acid acts as a chemical exfoliant which feels less harsh than physical ones like face scrubs

[ FOAMING CLEANSER ] Dispenses as a clear gel and transforms into a foaming face wash as you lather. With hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and vitamin D, this facial cleanser cleanses, exfoliates, and hydrates skin without leaving a stripped & tight feeling

[ FACE EXFOLIATOR FOR ACNE PRONE SKIN ] This face cleanser is suitable for acne prone, oily skin and even those with psoriasis. Cerave SA skin care products provide exfoliation and skin relief to dry skin, rough and bumpy skin, and all other skin types

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products, formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II)to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS & #1 DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED SKINCARE BRAND ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin; sensitive skin; oily skin; acne-prone; and more. FSA Eligible & HSA Eligible
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Renewing SA Cleanser exfoliates and detoxifies to remove dirt & oil while softening and smoothing skin without feeling dry. Unlike some exfoliating cleansers, CeraVe Renewing SA Cleanser contains no harsh beads, grains, or microbeads and is gentle on skin. This salicylic acid foaming gel cleanser is suitable for use on face and body as well as acne-prone skin.•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Gentle, non-irritating formulaKey Ingredients:•Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates for soft, smooth skin•Vitamin D: Provides antioxidant protection•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•Hyaluronic acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture•Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brightening Exfoliating Cleanser Consistent exfoliation is beneficial for all skin types, including acne-prone, oily skin, mature or aging skin, dry skin, and even those with psoriasis. Can be used as a daily exfoliator for normal skin or once-twice weekly for sensitive skin. How to Use Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse. Exfoliation can leave skin more sensitive to the sun. In the morning, follow daily with your favorite CeraVe Facial Moisturizer with SPF. Can be used as daily exfoliator for normal skin or once-twice weekly for sensitive skin. Suitable for Normal Skin Types All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists. Renewing SA Cleanser is formulated without fragrance and is non-comedogenic & allergy tested. It is suitable for normal skin types especially rough & bump skin. Salicylic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, and Ceramides Ceramides are naturally found in your skin and play a vital role in helping your skin protect you. They help fill in the gaps between your skin cells so your skin can seal in moisture and seal out impurities. Hyaluronic Acid helps retain skin's natural moisture. Niacinamide helps calm the skin. Salicylic acid is a Beta Hydroxy Acid (or BHA), which helps to slough off excess oil, sebum, and dead skin cells from the skin's surface, revealing softer, smoother, brighter skin. Salicylic acid acts as a chemical exfoliant, which is more gentle and effective than physical exfoliators like face scrubs.

Hydrating Facial Cleanser Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Cleanser Foaming Facial Cleanser Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser Renewing SA Cleanser Acne Control Cleanser Skin Type Normal to Very Dry Skin Normal to Dry Skin Normal to Oily Skin Acne-prone Skin Rough & Bumpy Skin Acne-prone Skin Key Ingredients Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid; Niacinamide Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Amino Acids Complex, Hyaluronic Acid Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid; Salicylic Acid Salicylic Acid; Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Hectorite Clay, Niacinamide Benefits Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier Cleanses, hydrates, and removes makeup without disrupting the skin's protective barrier Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier Cleanses, treats active breakouts, and maintains the skin's barrier. Exfoliates to remove dirt & oil while softening and smoothing skin. Reduces blackheads, helps prevent new breakouts, improves the look of pores

Renewing SA Cleanser Resurfacing Retinol Serum Daily Moisturizing Lotion Ultra-Light Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30 Skin Type Rough & Bumpy Skin Post-Acne Marks & Skin Texture Normal to Dry Skin Normal to Oily Skin Benefit Exfoliates to remove dirt & oil while softening and smoothing skin. Helps to reduce the appearance of post acne marks. Ceramides help to restore skin's natural barrier. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've used this product for years and it balances my combination skin. I moved from high desert to sea level. This face wash adapted with my skin needs. It's the perfect blend of a cleaner and foams for that perfect clean. I don't have wear foundation because it makes my skin look great, healthy and even. Best face wash out there, and it's cheaper on Amazon! I love it even more for that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cleanser Used for Double Cleansing
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser is one of the best cleansers out there. It is very light, scentless, and effective which is good for those who are sensitive to certain types of cleansers. I use this cleanser as a part of my double-cleansing routine because it gets its job done by cleansing and removing dirt and oils from my face. It feels really nice on the face as there are no strong scents or particles in the cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I regularly purchase this product because it seems to be one of the only cleansers that doesn’t break out my sensitive skin! There was a time when I was using multiple cleansers, serums, toners, etc and that all caused me to break out. I simplified my skin care routine and this is a holy grail for me. It’s unscented, prevents break outs, and is inexpensive. Great quality and value. Would recommend for daily use and for people with sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but I wish there was more
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser works well, but it doesn’t have any “cleaning feedback”. It doesn’t bubble or foam, it doesn’t smell, or have a tingling sensation. On the one hand, this would be a plus, but I kind of miss using something more like soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent facial cleanser
reviews.reviewText: This is a review of CeraVe SA Cleanser | Salicylic Acid Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide & Ceramides| BHA Exfoliant for Face | Fragrance Free Non-Comedogenic | 16 Ounce.There are so many questionable skin care products on the market; unknown companies, untrustworthy sources of manufacture. I"m happy to use CeraVe products which are dependable quality products that don't have to be second guessed. I don't feel I need to worry about them like I would worry about something made in China, for instance.My skin is oily and this facial cleanser helps greatly. It cleans thoroughly and the salicylic acid helps to exfoliate my skin. Along with Hyaluronic Acid which I believe is beneficial to helping reduce the ravages of aging skin, I think this is an overall excellent product. The larger size makes it very cost effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved my skin!
reviews.reviewText: To make the long story short, this is great for dry, sensitive skin, and it really helps clear acne!Full review:I've had acne since I was 10, and back in the summer of 2016, I was prescribed birth control and a few months of Retin-A cream. Retin-A cream can be really harsh, so I initially only used it for my body acne and not my face. Eventually I started using a tiny amount a few times a week to help my remaining facial acne as the birth control continued to clear it and to help smooth some wrinkles and maybe fade my acne scars. However, I was still using St. Ives apricot scrub with salicylic acid and some roc retinol cream a few nights a week also. Add in some time in the sun with no sunblock, and I ended up with a terribly burned face. This, along with the dryness from a Colorado fall/early winter made my skin extremely dry and painful. I couldn't even apply moisturizer without it burning. Needless to say, I had to stop using any face wash. The dryness also started to make my skin break out, and I couldn't treat it with anything. After desperately googling remedies for my dry skin and forming acne, I started using a mixture of tea tree, argan, jojoba, rose hip, and sometimes castor oil on my face along with frequent honey masks. This fixed my dry skin, which store bought moisturizers for extremely dry skin couldn't do, but I still had terrible acne, like the worst I've ever had in my life. I started using a bar of Cerave moisturizing soap because it was on clearance at walmart for like $1 and I'd heard of people using it for acne. This helped to make my face feel cleaner, but it didn't really help my acne. I knew I needed something that could exfoliate my skin, but there was no way I was going to use something as harsh as the St. Ives scrub again. I decided to try this because I did like the Cerave bar soap even though it didn't help my acne, and this has at least some salycilic acid for exfoliation. When I first used it, I didn't think it was really going to help my acne because the consistency is so smooth and it doesn't seem like it could really exfoliate. However, after 1-2 weeks, I started to notice my skin clearing up. Slowly but surely, this face wash helped to almost completely clear my skin. I had also started taking my birth control more regularly, added a probiotic supplement, and started using vitamin c on my face, so I can't say this is the only thing that helped my acne, but it certainly contributed a lot. I also eventually started using an electric face brush to help exfoliate, and I think that could've helped. I still get acne around my period, and because I'm a college senior, so I'm always super stressed, don't get enough sleep, and don't always eat right. Also, you can't tell from the pictures, but I have quite a few blackheads on my nose. The face wash has helped clear some of those and make them smaller, but I have yet to find a product that actually completely gets rid of them, and I've tried many. Even with the blackheads, my skin is so much better now. This face wash saved my skin, and I think it's worth every penny!Pictures:Picture 1- The right side is a picture from February 14, 2017 without any makeup after starting my oil treatment. The left side is from April 7, 2017 with makeup, but you can still see how awful my skin was. I didn't start using the face wash until around the end of April.Picture 2- The left part is from July 7, 2017, and the two on the right are both from July 17, 2017. I am wearing makeup in all of these pictures, but you can tell that my skin had improved significantly. Few pimples, but lots of acne scars from the breakout.Picture 3- Both were taken August 21, 2017 with make up. Once again you can see I don't have many pimples, just terrible acne scars.Picture 4- The left part was taken December 12, 2017. I was testing a BB cream, so it is cover the bottom half of my face, but you can see that my skin looks pretty clear. The top right side was taken December 13 with the BB cream on my entire face. The bottom right picture was taken today with no makeup. As I said previously, I still get pimples from stress and periods, but they are usually small and mild instead of the giant lumps I was getting before, and they go away really quickly using cosrx pimple patches (definitely check those out) and vitamin c serum. Also, please note that I do have freckles, so most of the spots on my face are just freckles or dark marks from old acne I am still trying to get rid of. Sorry for the long review, and all the pictures with makeup (I didn't take many without makeup when my skin was that bad), but I hope it helped!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've always been a huge Cetaphil and CeraVe fan. My dermatologist recommended this brand to me when I was in college and I never looked back! I bought this face wash for my husband who thinks washing his face just means throwing water on it. He uses it every day and likes how soft his face is after showering. I have also noticed a difference as he doesn't break out as much after shaving anymore. If you have a stubborn significant other like me, buy this! It's easy enough for them to use and they'll love it too! Smell isn't overpowering and it gets the job done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have dry skin, this cleanser doesn’t dry out my skin
reviews.reviewText: This is a great cleanser. I have dry skin, and use it every day. My kids use this cleanser as well. Cleanser has a lite clean fragrance. Inexpensive and this product qualifies to pay with your HSA account.

reviews.reviewTitle: gives you smooth skin and clears out those pores
reviews.reviewText: My usual has been out of stock for a while and i used ths waiting, Gives me small pores and reallt makesmy skin gleam
Es una maravilla, limpia a profundidad y queda la piel muy suave.

reviews.reviewText: The item came with the bottle being damaged causing most of the liquid inside to spill. Haven't used it.
Fick den nästan halv full, med läckage i förpackningen. Är det därför man har fått rea på produkten. Utöver så tycker jag produkten håller vad den lovar.
